meanings.definition: In a manner that is related to sight or the sense of vision.
meanings.sent1: She could see the painting visually, without touching it.
meanings.sent2: The movie was presented visually, with vibrant colors and stunning visuals.
meanings.sent3: The visually impaired cat tried to watch TV with no success.
meanings.sent4: Her words painted a visually stunning picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was visually breathtaking, lighting up the night sky.

meanings.definition: By means of visual aids or images.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the concept visually using diagrams.
meanings.sent2: The infographic helped to explain the data visually.
meanings.sent3: The visually appealing charts made the presentation more engaging.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked visually, always picturing solutions in her head.
meanings.sent5: The map guided them visually through the winding streets of the old town.

meanings.definition: In a way that is appealing or attractive to the sense of sight.
meanings.sent1: The fashion show was visually stunning, showcasing elegant designs.
meanings.sent2: The website was designed visually to attract more visitors.
meanings.sent3: The visually pleasing dessert tempted everyone at the table.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was visually captivating, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The garden was visually enchanting, filled with colorful flowers and lush greenery.
